title: No, Obama and Former Italian Prime Minister Renzi Didn’t Rig US Election
subtitle: A viral story tossed around social media built on debunked mass voter fraud conspiracy theories.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Former U.S. President Barack Obama "ordered" former Italian Prime Minister Matteo Renzi to cooperate in a massive-scale voter fraud scheme to flip votes from Trump to Biden, four years into the future.
